summary:
## Summary I completed both tasks in this session: ### Task 1: Update seo-contracts-list.blade.php hero to dark theme - Changed section background from `bg-transparent` to `bg-slate-950 -mx-4 sm:-mx-6 lg:-mx-8` for full-bleed dark background - Added inner wrapper div `max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8` to constrain content - Updated badge from green theme (`bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-400`) to coral theme (`bg-coral-50 text-coral-700`) - Changed h1 from `text-slate-900` to `text-white` - Changed description from `text-slate-500` to `text-slate-300` - Updated padding to `py-12 lg:py-20` to match contracts-list.blade.php reference ### Task 2: Add wrapper div for content after hero - Changed outer div from `max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8` to just `
` (Livewire root) - Added content wrapper `
` after the hero section - Added closing `
` at the end to properly close the wrapper The seo-contra
